name: Gorilla Ops v0.2.0
description:
The second build of Gorilla Ops.

I have added many new things to this build of Gorilla Ops:

- A new hub map

- Ammo storage pouch

- Shooting range

How to open PC version:

- unzip the folder

- open the folder

- launch the 'Gorilla Ops' executable 

How to open the Quest version:

- Open Sidequest

- Drag the APK file into Sidequest

- Navigate into unknown sources on your quest as you would do with any other Sidequest game

Discord server:

https://discord.gg/rBKeqfjcHQ
